entities.name: death chamber
entities.description: The room where the escaped Death Eaters are contained.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The main character and a powerful wizard.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: A Ministry of Magic official who is initially against Dumbledore.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist and a powerful wizard who has returned.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Fudge are arguing about the return of Voldemort.
Dumbledore is opposed to the Aurors, who are working for Fudge.
Fudge orders Dawlish and Williamson to go down to the Death Chamber.
Fudge also orders Williamson to go down to the Death Chamber.
